text: Le Val is a commune. It is in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Doubs department in east France. The municipality was created on 1 January 2017 and consists of the former communes of Pointvillers (the seat) and Montfort.Arrêté préfectoral 23 November 2016 == References == Category:2017 establishments in France Category:Communes in Doubs
title: Le Val, Doubs
